info.name: Night Sky (V3) - For Edgenuity
info.description:
A pretty night sky theme for Edgenuity. Gradient top menu, pretty background. 

A clean looking edit to Edgenuity. Easy to customize if you know a little CSS, or ask me and I'll make you a custom Edgenuity theme for $1.
info.additionalInfo:
~ Change Log ~

=========== New in version 2!
- New footer, now clear
- Next Activity Button won't appear until you are done with the assignment
- Fixed some visual issues when on a screen resolution other than 1920 x 1080

=========== New in version 3!
- Rounded Borders on everything!
- Adjusted colors and background blur 
- More fixes on resizing issues

=========== New in version 4!
- I'm leaving userstyles.org. Although it's convenient, I just can't wait hours for the pages to load just to upload a few extra lines of code here. 

- Test taking page looks much better!
- Now transparent, no ugly gold font, removed god awful attempt boxes. 
- More transparency on more objects. 
- Fixed a few more issues with resizing
- Posted to Reddit!
